section.title: Attributes preferences
section.para: In the Attributes preferences page you can configure general settings for attributes.
In the Attribute Colors and Fonts group you can define the style how attributes and values are displayed within the Entry editor and the Search Result editor.

By default non-text attributes are displayed in a user-friendly way within the Entry editor and the Search Result editor. For example if an attribute contains a timestamp it is displayed in your local date format. When checking the option Show raw values the values are displayed as returned from directory.

section.title: Value Editors preferences
section.para: In the Value Editors preferences page you can configure which value editor to use for an attribute.

You can specify value editors by attribute type or by syntax. If a value editor is specified by syntax the value editor is used for all attriutes with this syntax. A value editor specified for an attributes overwrites the syntax-setting.

section.para: In the Browser preferences page you can configure the layout and behaviour of the LDAP Browser view and the Select DN dialog.

section.para: On the LDIF Editor preference pages you can configure the LDIF editor.

simplesect.para: On the Content Assistant preference page you can configure content assistent settings.

simplesect.title: Syntax Coloring
simplesect.para: On the Syntax Coloring preference page you can configure fonts and colors.

To modify color and font options select a element from the list. The color could be changed by invoking the color button. The font options could be changed by toggeling the Bold, Italic, Strikethrough and Underline check boxes.
Changes are immediately displayed in the preview.
